alert.note: Alert for Fannin; Lumpkin; Towns; Union; White (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 3:58PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Towns, northeastern Lumpkin, White, Union and east central Fannin Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 357 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms extended from near Jones Creek to Low Gap Shelter to near Sautee, and moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Hiawassee, Blairsville, Young Harris, Helen, Suches, Unicoi State Park, Robertstown, Blue Mountain Shelter, Gumlog, Mossy Creek, Jones Creek, Titus, Woods Hole Shelter, Low Gap Shelter, Vogel State Park, Anna Ruby Falls, Leaf, Plum Orchard Gap Shelter and Turners Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
